test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(1, 1, "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 3) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 3) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(sum((), ()))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 0.0) instance of xs:decimal`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((), 0.0) eq 0.0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(()) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(()) instance of xs:integer`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((-5, -0, -3, -6)) eq -14`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((1, 2, 3, xs:float("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((1, 2, 3, xs:double("NaN")))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((xs:double("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-14
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((xs:float("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-15
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((1, 2, xs:double("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-16
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string(sum((1, 2, xs:float("NaN"), 1, 2, 3))) eq "NaN"`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-17
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(xs:untypedAtomic("3")) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-18
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((1, 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-19
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((1, 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) eq 6`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-20
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((xs:float(1), 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) eq 6`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-21
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((xs:float(1), 2, xs:untypedAtomic("3"))) instance of xs:double`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-22
test-case.description: fn:sum() having an input sequence whose static type is xs:anyAtomicType.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-23
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum("a string")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-24
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(xs:anyURI("a string"))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-25
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((1, 2, 3, xs:anyURI("a string"), xs:double("NaN")))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-26
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((1, 2, 3, xs:anyURI("a string"), xs:double("NaN")), 3)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-27
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(((),())) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-28
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum(()) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-29
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((3, 4, 5)) eq 12`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-30
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), xs:yearMonthDuration("P10M"))) eq xs:yearMonthDuration("P250M")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-31
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), xs:yearMonthDuration("P10M")) [. < xs:yearMonthDuration("P3M")], xs:yearMonthDuration("P0M")) eq xs:yearMonthDuration("P0M")`.
test-case.test: sum((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), xs:yearMonthDuration("P10M")) [. < xs:yearMonthDuration("P3M")], xs:yearMonthDuration("P0M")) eq xs:yearMonthDuration("P0M")

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-32
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((1 to 100)[. < 0], 0) eq 0`.

test-case.name: K-SeqSUMFunc-33
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `sum((xs:yearMonthDuration("P20Y"), (3, 4, 5)))`.

test-case.description: Ensure the return type is properly inferred.

test-case.description: Test sum(1 to 10)

test-case.name: cbcl-sum-func-003
test-case.description: Test sum($x to $y)
test-case.test: for $x in 1 to 10, $y in 1 to 10 return concat('sum(',$x,' to ',$y,') = ',sum($x to $y))

result.assert-string-value: sum(1 to 1) = 1 sum(1 to 2) = 3 sum(1 to 3) = 6 sum(1 to 4) = 10 sum(1 to 5) = 15 sum(1 to 6) = 21 sum(1 to 7) = 28 sum(1 to 8) = 36 sum(1 to 9) = 45 sum(1 to 10) = 55 sum(2 to 1) = 0 sum(2 to 2) = 2 sum(2 to 3) = 5 sum(2 to 4) = 9 sum(2 to 5) = 14 sum(2 to 6) = 20 sum(2 to 7) = 27 sum(2 to 8) = 35 sum(2 to 9) = 44 sum(2 to 10) = 54 sum(3 to 1) = 0 sum(3 to 2) = 0 sum(3 to 3) = 3 sum(3 to 4) = 7 sum(3 to 5) = 12 sum(3 to 6) = 18 sum(3 to 7) = 25 sum(3 to 8) = 33 sum(3 to 9) = 42 sum(3 to 10) = 52 sum(4 to 1) = 0 sum(4 to 2) = 0 sum(4 to 3) = 0 sum(4 to 4) = 4 sum(4 to 5) = 9 sum(4 to 6) = 15 sum(4 to 7) = 22 sum(4 to 8) = 30 sum(4 to 9) = 39 sum(4 to 10) = 49 sum(5 to 1) = 0 sum(5 to 2) = 0 sum(5 to 3) = 0 sum(5 to 4) = 0 sum(5 to 5) = 5 sum(5 to 6) = 11 sum(5 to 7) = 18 sum(5 to 8) = 26 sum(5 to 9) = 35 sum(5 to 10) = 45 sum(6 to 1) = 0 sum(6 to 2) = 0 sum(6 to 3) = 0 sum(6 to 4) = 0 sum(6 to 5) = 0 sum(6 to 6) = 6 sum(6 to 7) = 13 sum(6 to 8) = 21 sum(6 to 9) = 30 sum(6 to 10) = 40 sum(7 to 1) = 0 sum(7 to 2) = 0 sum(7 to 3) = 0 sum(7 to 4) = 0 sum(7 to 5) = 0 sum(7 to 6) = 0 sum(7 to 7) = 7 sum(7 to 8) = 15 sum(7 to 9) = 24 sum(7 to 10) = 34 sum(8 to 1) = 0 sum(8 to 2) = 0 sum(8 to 3) = 0 sum(8 to 4) = 0 sum(8 to 5) = 0 sum(8 to 6) = 0 sum(8 to 7) = 0 sum(8 to 8) = 8 sum(8 to 9) = 17 sum(8 to 10) = 27 sum(9 to 1) = 0 sum(9 to 2) = 0 sum(9 to 3) = 0 sum(9 to 4) = 0 sum(9 to 5) = 0 sum(9 to 6) = 0 sum(9 to 7) = 0 sum(9 to 8) = 0 sum(9 to 9) = 9 sum(9 to 10) = 19 sum(10 to 1) = 0 sum(10 to 2) = 0 sum(10 to 3) = 0 sum(10 to 4) = 0 sum(10 to 5) = 0 sum(10 to 6) = 0 sum(10 to 7) = 0 sum(10 to 8) = 0 sum(10 to 9) = 0 sum(10 to 10) = 10
